name: Candy Blast Blitz
description:
Sweet and delicious candy awaits you inside Candy Blast Blitz!

Crush those colorful candies when you match 3 of the same color. Match 4 or more candies and create candy blast bonuses. Make sweet and yummy combinations within the given moves to blast your way through hundreds of levels in this delicious puzzle game.

CANDY BLAST BLITZ FEATURES:

- Hundreds of sweet and delicious levels inside.
- Super tasty graphics to savor.
- Match 4 or more candies and create candy blast bonuses.
- Blast your way through candy cane chains and iced candy.
- Make sweet and yummy combinations within the given moves.

Candy Blast Blitz is completely free to play, however it does contain ads. If you like this game, feel free to support this developer by upgrading to the ad-free version of this game called "Candy Blast Blitz Premium".
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/candy-blast-blitz-premium/id1150741031?mt=8

Download Candy Blast Blitz and satisfy your sweet tooth!
